body.raw:
## Overview

A responsive internal site to visualize sales data with dynamic charts and drill-down reports.

## Technologies

- React
- Material-UI
- JavaScript
- Chart.js
- HTML/CSS

## Tasks

- Build UI with React + Material-UI
- Integrate APIs for real-time sales data
- Implement Chart.js charts & interactions
- Deploy the application

## Screenshots

- `/report.png`
- `/report-1.png`
